author: The Editorial Board
title: California Deems Pot an Essential Coronavirus Business - The Wall Street Journal
description: California Deems Pot an Essential Coronavirus Business The Wall Street Journal
content: Potheads panicked after California Gov. Gavin Newsom last week ordered all non-essential businesses to close and citizens to stay home except to perform essential activities. Over the weekend Mr. Newsom told them to chill and that producing, selling and buyin… [+270 chars]
